value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral STRUGGLES vs Protoss? (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series between Serral (Zerg) and Gerald (Protoss). The games in this series are macro games, Serral's speciality, and yet he struggles against Gerald's macro Protoss style.
